mapper.select: select id,main_pic mainPic,name,title,introduction,culture_pic culturePic,cellPhone,worth_pic worthPic,code,development,address,allnumber,serverTime servertime,create_time from marry_company where state=#{state} order by create_time DESC

mapper.select:

FROM marry_company a
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO marry_company( main_pic, name, title, introduction, culture_pic, worth_pic, development, allnumber, servertime, address, code, cellphone, create_time, state ) VALUES ( #{mainPic}, #{name}, #{title}, #{introduction}, #{culturePic}, #{worthPic}, #{development}, #{allnumber}, #{servertime}, #{address}, #{code}, #{cellphone}, #{createTime}, #{state} )
mapper.update: UPDATE marry_company SET main_pic = #{mainPic}, name = #{name}, title = #{title}, introduction = #{introduction}, culture_pic = #{culturePic}, worth_pic = #{worthPic}, development = #{development}, allnumber = #{allnumber}, servertime = #{servertime}, address = #{address}, code = #{code}, cellphone = #{cellphone}, create_time = #{createTime}, state = #{state} WHERE id = #{id}
